CosmereResources.Defs.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Atium
CosmereResources.Defs.MetalDef.label: atium
CosmereResources.Defs.MetalDef.description: Atium is the god metal of the Shard Ruin. It grants its user visions of others' immediate futures, offering immense strategic advantage in combat and prediction.
